post:
![](https://www.gestiondbi.com/img/companyLogo.png)

Happy New Year to all LowEndTalk members! :)

You will find below the repost of our recent LowEndBox offer. Watch this offer carefully! There is prizes to win and a freebie available!

**Please take note, all price below are in Canadian Dollars.**

<hr>

Offer #1:
<pre>
LEB16-OVZ768
– 768MB RAM
– 1x vCPU
– 30GB HDD space
– 1TB transfer
– 1Gbps uplink
– 1x IPv4
– IPv6 subnet
– OpenVZ/SolusVM
– 3.00$CAD/month
– 25$CAD/year
– Locations: All our locations
– Order link: http://gdbi.pw/leb16a
</pre>

Offer #2:
<pre>
LEB16-Storage
– 128MB RAM
– 1x vCPU
– 100GB HDD space
– 1TB transfer
– 100Mbps uplink
– 1x IPv4
– IPv6 subnet
– OpenVZ/SolusVM
– 18$CAD/semi-annualy
– 30$CAD/year
– Locations: All our locations
– Order link: http://gdbi.pw/leb16b
</pre>

It’s not over! We will also giveaway to 3 lucky winners who orders a new VPS between December 30, 2016 and January 30, 2017:

- Account Credits gift of $25. (1 winner)
-  Account Credits gift of $10. (2 winner)

Also, all new orders of this exclusive LET plans made via Bitcoin are eligible to a free additional IPv4. Contact our sales team to request.

<hr>

- We support TUN/TAP/PPP
- We tolerate TOR RELAY on dedicated IP only. No TOR EXIT.
- We do not accept Torrenting software. 
- View our AuP and ToS: https://www.clients.gestiondbi.com/index.php?/knowledgebase/category/6/legal-stuff/
- Looking Glass available at: https://www.gestiondbi.com/en/faq
- We accept payment via Paypal, Credit Card (via Stripe), Bitcoin (via Bitpay), 2Checkout and Interac e-Transfer (Canadian residents only)


Regards, David


Original post link: http://gdbi.pw/lebdec16
